sentence.Network_en: The press regard her as merely one of a ruling troika.
sentence.Network_cn: 新闻界仅把她视为执政三巨头之一。

sentence.Network_en: Nonetheless, the E . U . troika persevered, despite U.S. scepticism at their approach.
sentence.Network_cn: 然而, 欧盟的这三驾马车没有动摇, 即使美国对它们的方式持怀疑态度.

拒绝三头马车(troika)和市场的敲诈！只有大众抗争可以停止紧缩的束缚！

list.abs: 图文(professional);女款女生彩宜卡(womens troika)、帆布莎丽丝(celeste canvas )等产品在首届Jeep中国大会中尽显风头,它凭借独特的专利材质croslite和时尚绚丽的设计.
troika mission ( EU ) (欧盟)三人代表团

entry.tran: 三人领导小组;三头政治;三国集团
entry.def: Journalists sometimes refer to a group of three powerful politicians or states as a troika .

example.ex: ...leader of the troika of past, present and future presidents...
example.tran: 前总统、现任总统与继任总统组成的三驾马车

example.ex: The press regard her as merely one of a ruling troika.
example.tran: 新闻界仅把她视为执政三巨头之一。

means.word_mean: 1. a Russian carriage pulled by three horses abreast
2. the cardinal number that is the sum of one and one and one
